_source.short_desc: Take control of your QHSE management system. All Quality, Safety & Security Management tools on one platform.
_source.long_desc:
Companies that comply or are planning to comply with several industry standards such as ISO9001, ISO45001, ISO14001, ISO22001, ISO27001, and the like.

Qooling helps companies to build better, safer, and more secure products and services. The platform allows you to easily gather information from production plants or sides through the easy-to-use interface for the people in the field. This gives companies the ability to really leverage the data to improve the company.
_source.pricing_details:
Light

€ 12 / Month

Per user, paid annually € 14 / Per user, billed monthly

Light: €14.00/user/month (or €11.00/user/month when billed annually) Starter: €61.00/user/month (or €58.00/user/month when billed annually) Advanced: €68.00/user/month (or €65.00/user/month when billed annually) Enterprise: contact Qooling for enterprise pricing information.
_source.target_audience: Companies that comply or are planning to comply with several industry standards such as ISO9001, ISO45001, ISO14001, ISO22001, ISO27001, and the like.

related_products.short_desc: Complete all your safety forms and documents on mobile devices from the field. Login online to track and monitor safety activity.
related_products.features:

The easiest way to manage your entire safety program from mobile apps and the web. SiteDocs features a custom form builder, PDF document library, worker certification management, offline-mode, and more. SiteDocs will help you easily manage your safety program while saving you time and helping you maintain the highest standard of safety possible.

related_products.short_desc: ServiceTitan is the leading business software that's changing the way residential and commercial septic companies do business.
related_products.features: ServiceTitan is the leading all-in-one software solution for residential and commercial septic businesses. With powerful tools that improve sales, supercharge your team, and provide real-time insights, ServiceTitan is trusted by more than 100,000 service professionals and by the world's best companies. related_products.short_desc: iAuditor puts the power in your teams' hands. Every person and every device can be a window to your worksite.
related_products.features: Safety is now a core component of brand reputation across every industry. Everyone has the right to expect a safe experience so businesses must prioritise the safety of their people and customers, with clear lines of communication that make everyone an active participant. With iAuditor you can share inspection reports with your stakeholders and other teams just by clicking a button. This commitment of adopting a safety culture holds the key to getting the world safely back to business.

related_products.short_desc: Simplify your EHS management operations and streamline business processes with HIPAA-compliant smart mobile form apps for the field.
related_products.features: Streamline your business processes and seamlessly integrate with your safety system of record. Our no-code app field team platform enables you to develop HIPAA-compliant EHS forms tailored to meet each job's unique compliance requirements and keep field technicians safe. Enterprise-grade analytics tools create insightful and interactive dashboards to help you predict potential risks before they occur, and respond faster when they do, with accelerated data sharing and incident reporting.

related_products.short_desc: Digitize your EHS&S forms and workflows using the #1 no code mobile-cloud platform. Get transparent compliance today.
related_products.features:
Establish a safe and efficient work environment, minimize risk, and meet compliance standards. Completely digitize your Environmental, Health, Safety and Sustainability data collection and processes with our cloud solution.

Our solution is mobile, offline capable, beautiful reports, KPIs, repeat items, automatic email notifications and more.

Incidents, Audits & Inspections, Actions & Tasks, Work, Observations, Sustainability, Safety Meetings, Go Mobile, Use Best Practices

related_products.short_desc: Multichannel emergency communication software that provides two-way messaging, integrated threat intelligence, and safety monitoring.
related_products.features: AlertMedia is the world's leading emergency communication provider. Our award-winning, two-way multichannel messaging system, fully integrated threat intelligence, and employee safety monitoring capabilities helps organizations protect their business and people through all phases of an emergency. Implementation and personalized 24/7 support are included and our intuitive platform takes just 15 minutes to learn.

related_products.short_desc: The Most Trusted EHS Enterprise Software for Assuring Client Success for Over 30 years.
related_products.features: Cority is the most trusted EHS software for assuring top performing organizations' success. Cority's comprehensive SaaS platform helps organizations securely manage EHS information across departments, regions and the globe. Over 1,300 enterprise organizations in 77 countries trust Cority to ensure global compliance, mitigate risk, standardize procedures, drive operational excellence and keep employees safe, healthy and productive.

related_products.short_desc: Integrated QHSE management system software, Cloud-based, helping SMB's manage compliance activities in a single, easy to use solution.
related_products.features:
Mango helps control and maintain all aspects of your quality, health,  safety (QHSE) management system(s); including: policies, procedures & forms (with single-source document control); accidents & incidents; Audits/Inspections; Improvements (NCR's, CAPA's, etc.); hazard & risk management; and people management (competencies & training).

In addition, Mango helps our customers manage their Plant & Equipment (including scheduled maintenance and requests), Food Safety, & compliance calendar.

related_products.short_desc: Partners in compliance and management systems excellence. Learn more about our intuitive applications serving the full-spectrum of EHS.
related_products.features: Benchmark ESG | Gensuite EHS Management Software helps organizations comply with regulations, improve safety processes, reduce environmental impact, and boost sustainability measures. Benchmark offers an entire suite of EHS applications that are user-friendly, robust, and highly configurable to meet the needs of the EHS front line and growing organizational needs. For over two decades, our senior leadership team has worked in the EHS industry building EHS solutions for Fortune 100 companies.

similar_products.short_desc: A mobile-first EHS solution to help you simplify safety, empower your workforce, and proactively minimize risk on-site.

similar_products.short_desc: With over 400 businesses using Evotix, we are transforming the way employees engage in workplace health and safety.

With Evotix you can manage all safety processes in one place, from incident reporting to inspection regimes. similar_products.short_desc: Be the solution. Recognize the true cost of carbon.

With all your data flowing directly onto one platform, you can efficiently quantify your carbon footprint across Scope 1, 2 and 3 emissions. related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Emissions Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Emissions Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Emissions Management software helps organizations forecast future emissions, calculate the actual output, manage market transactions and ensure compliance with regional, state and national regulations. Features of this software include market evaluation, emissions reduction planning, automatic CO2 calculations and permit level maintenance.

related_categories.meta_description: Environmental software, sometimes called environmental management systems (EMS), helps organizations with the tracking, reporting, and enforcement of internal environmental policies as well as compliance with government regulations. It can assist with incorporating environmental concerns into risk management programs.
related_categories.description: Environmental software, sometimes called environmental management systems (EMS), helps organizations with the tracking, reporting and enforcement of internal environmental policies as well as compliance with government regulations. It can assist with incorporating environmental concerns into risk management programs. Environmental software, is related to EHS Management software, Emissions Management software and Compliance software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Facility Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Facility Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Facility Management software enables organizations to more effectively administer facility and plant assets. Details such as building layouts, assets, employees, and square footage are recorded and made readily accessible. Facility Management solutions allow for easy access to drawings and schematics, room scheduling, preventative maintenance tasks, work orders, and records for equipment including lighting, security, HVAC, elevators, and fire alarms. Facility Management software is related to Fixed Asset Management software, Building Maintenance software, Equipment Maintenance software, HVAC software, Maintenance Management software, EHS Management software, Visitor Management software, and Scheduling software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Quality Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Quality Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Quality Management software automates the process of tracking and minimizing product defects. Organizations use these applications to monitor and control product quality. Through the collection and analysis of data from users, organizations can identify, isolate and correct unforeseen product defects or other issues that may emerge in the course of production. Quality Management solutions also provide tools to evaluate the effectiveness of notification campaigns, recalls and repair attempts. QMS also aids in maintaining product compliance with applicable international regulations. Quality Management software is related to Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software and Product Lifecycle Management software.

Mobile capabilities ease collaboration amongst teams for optimal success of your audit processes and program.

related_products.short_desc: #1 Audit Management platform to solve ALL your requirements. Simple for workers to use, simple for managers to customize.
related_products.features: #1 Audit Management Software solution that connects your management system from your visitors to your internal management team. Donesafe makes it fast and easy to access, enter and report visitor data in real time. Donesafe is a modern & fresh platform with end to end functionality. It works online with any device, including offline with native iOS and Android apps. Use our out-of-the-box templates or configure to align with your specific requirements. Try now.

similar_products.short_desc: AuditBoard transforms how audit, risk, and compliance professionals manage today's risk landscape with a modern, connected platform.
similar_products.features: AuditBoard is the leading cloud-based platform transforming audit, risk, and compliance management. More than 35% of the Fortune 500 leverage AuditBoard to move their businesses forward with greater clarity and agility. AuditBoard is top-rated by customers on G2, Capterra, and Gartner Peer Insights, and was recently ranked for the third year in a row as one of the fastest-growing technology companies in North America by Deloitte.

similar_products.short_desc: Onspring's Audit software puts you in control of the entire IA process. User-friendly, easy setup & flexible to fit custom processes.
similar_products.features: Onspring helps you stay organized, work efficiently, align with the IIA standards and focus on what matters. Through our cloud-based internal audit software, you can align audit plans with your organization's most significant risks and objectives. Manage workpapers, findings, review notes and milestones through user-friendly dashboards. Coordinate with process owners, management and other assurance functions, and report audit status and results in real-time.

similar_products.short_desc: Hyperproof simplifies audit management with easy task management, automated evidence collection, and audit preparedness tracking.
similar_products.features: Hyperproof, cloud-based GRC audit software is purpose-built to manage your ongoing compliance operations at scale. Hyperproof brings efficiency to compliance with pre-built frameworks templates to get started quickly, automated evidence collection and testing, task management to streamline team collaboration, and audit preparedness to ensure you are always ready for your auditor. Remove the repetitive work related to compliance and focus on strategic efforts instead with the power of Hyperproof.

similar_products.short_desc: Fortune 500 teams use FORM OpX to audit and improve compliance and drive the right action with digital forms, workflows, and reporting.
similar_products.features: Fortune 500 teams use FORM OpX to audit and improve compliance to standards and drive the right action with digital forms, workflows, and reporting. Configure and assign audits and collect data and photos on mobile. Track compliance with conditional logic and scoring, then trigger corrective/preventative actions, workflows, and task reassignment across systems. Set alerts, automate notifications, and work in offline mode. Share insights and make better decisions with mobile and desktop reports.

similar_products.short_desc:

similar_products.short_desc: With Risk Cloud, you can save time and resources by having one centralized source of truth and automating workflows and manual tasks.
similar_products.features: Managing audit and control procedures can be time-consuming and tedious, especially when they're scattered throughout spreadsheets and email. With LogicGate Risk Cloud, you can save time and resources by having one centralized source of truth and automating workflows and manual tasks.

similar_products.short_desc: Shorten audits from weeks to days by building your unique audit processes within the platform so you can focus on driving revenue.
similar_products.features: Shorten auditing times from weeks to days, with high confidence and direct access to evidence. Build your unique audit processes within the platform and easily standardize them across multiple standards including ISO, SOC, NIST, HIPPA, PCI DSS, FedRAMP, GDPR, and more. On-premise or in the cloud, StandardFusion makes GRC easy so you can focus on driving revenue.

similar_products.short_desc: Benchmark ESG Audit Management Software simplifies inspections, regulatory compliance, follow-up processes, and corrective actions.
similar_products.features: Benchmark ESG | Gensuite's award-winning Audit Management Software simplifies regulatory compliance and audit inspection processes using a digital, collaborative approach. The audit solution streamlines program requirements through an integrated suite of auditing, inspection and corrective action tracking tools with robust analytics and actionable insights. Mobile capabilities ease collaboration amongst teams for optimal success of your audit processes and program.

similar_products.short_desc: ADAudit Plus is Active Directory, Azure AD, Windows Server, file server (including NAS devices), and workstation auditing software.
similar_products.features: ManageEngine ADAudit Plus is an IT security and compliance solution. With over 200 reports and real-time alerts, it provides complete visibility into all the activities across your Active Directory (AD), Azure AD, file servers (Windows, NetApp, EMC, Synology, Hitachi, and Huawei), Windows servers, and workstations. ADAudit Plus helps you track user logon and logoff activity; analyze account lockouts; audit ADFS, ADLDS, and printers; monitor privileged user activities; and do much more.

similar_products.short_desc: Resolver's internal audit software empowers agile, risk-based audits and improves client interactivity to stay ahead of emerging risks.
similar_products.features: Resolver's internal audit software empowers agile, risk-based audits and improves client interactivity, allowing teams to stay ahead of emerging risks. By automating data sharing with risk and compliance, Resolver ensures auditors can always make decisions off the latest information. Being aware of change is one thing; keeping up is another. Our client portal makes collecting information easy, and our automated workflows ensure your team can maintain assurance when faced with rapid change.

similar_products.short_desc: The Audit Software on Microsoft 365. Bring EHS Into The Everyday with Teams, SharePoint & Power BI. Best Suited to 1,000+ Employees.
similar_products.features:
Discover the Audit Software on Microsoft 365. Best Suited to Enterprises with 1,000+ Employees. 

Seamless integration with SharePoint, Teams & Power BI lets everyone spend less time on admin and more time on things that matter.

Configured to you, Pro-Sapien brings Environmental, Health & Safety (EHS) Auditing to the Microsoft apps you use everyday. 

Identify and fix issues early with a flexible audit form, approval workflow, actions & KPI reporting.

Get in touch or view a demo today!

similar_products.short_desc: iAuditor is a simpler way to get the information you need to drive safety, quality, and efficiency, all in one place.
similar_products.features: Safety is now a core component of brand reputation across every industry. Everyone has the right to expect a safe experience so businesses must prioritise the safety of their people and customers, with clear lines of communication that make everyone an active participant. With iAuditor you can share inspection reports with your stakeholders and other teams just by clicking a button. This commitment of adopting a safety culture holds the key to getting the world safely back to business.

similar_products.short_desc: monitorQA is collaborative and affordable audit software that simplifies how you collect, track, and use data about your operations.
similar_products.features:
monitorQA is mobile audit software used by companies that require compliance with operational (health, safety, and quality) standards and processes.

Companies use monitorQA to create smart, industry-specific checklists, conduct on-site inspections, analyze data, and share operational insights in real-time to create a collaborative inspection process that enhances visibility for corrective actions at individual locations, across regions, or the entire company.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting software automates an organization's financial functions and transactions with modules including accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, billing and general ledger. Integration of Accounting applications allows for comprehensive, real-time, on-demand analysis of an organization's financial status. Toolsets within Accounting solutions can often be customized to the specific needs of an organization. Accounting software is related to Audit software, Billing and Invoicing software, Compliance software and Financial Reporting software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Compliance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Compliance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Compliance software enables an organization to monitor internal controls to ensure that standards and regulations are met. Compliance solutions that focus on financial and accounting compliance standards, such as the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, help organizations streamline financial documentation, audit trails, and reporting. Compliance solutions that focus on environmental compliance standards help organizations monitor and report on emissions, hazmat procedures, and regulatory policies. Compliance software is related to Accounting software, and EHS Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Financial Reporting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Financial Reporting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Financial Reporting software automates the task of reporting an organization's financial results, status and transactions. Financial Reporting applications help organizations control and increase operational efficiencies. These solutions provide the ability to collect, translate and consolidate data from various systems and geographic locations. Financial Reporting software is related to Accounting software, Budgeting software, Business Performance Management software and Compliance software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Financial Risk Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Financial Risk Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Financial Risk Management software monitors and evaluates market risk and credit risk for financial institutions. These applications automate portfolio management and incorporate accounting features as well as trade and asset tracking systems and regulatory compliance management, enabling increased efficiency and revenue optimization. Financial Risk Management software is related to Risk Management software, Banking Systems software, Investment Management software, Loan Origination software and Loan Servicing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top HIPAA Compliance software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of HIPAA Compliance tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: HIPAA Compliance Software allows medical practices to ensure compliance with federal HIPAA regulations. These solutions help keep patients' Protected Health Information secure, and can also provide risk management, compliance, and audit planning.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Risk Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Risk Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Risk Management software helps organizations reduce exposure to enterprise and operational risks, improving quality and minimizing losses through better management of data. These solutions track incidents, facilitate evaluation of corrective actions, monitor enterprise-level performance, and promote compliance. Business intelligence and exception management are typical features of Risk Management software. For related software solutions see Financial Risk Management software and Compliance software.
